summary: This is an email chain from July 27, 2019, forwarding a news report about Jeffrey Epstein's cellmate, Michael Thomas, who claims to have saved Epstein from a suicide attempt by hanging. The email originates from a Bureau of Prisons supervisor at the Metropolitan Correctional Center in New York.

persons.name: Michael Thomas
persons.context: Identified as Jeffrey Epstein's former cellmate at the Metropolitan Correctional Center who claims to have saved Epstein from a hanging suicide attempt.

persons.name: Jeffrey Epstein
persons.context: The incarcerated individual whose cellmate, Michael Thomas, claims to have prevented his suicide by hanging.

connections.description: Michael Thomas was Jeffrey Epstein's cellmate at the Metropolitan Correctional Center and claims to have saved him from a hanging.

events.title: Email about Epstein's cellmate's claim
events.description: An email is sent forwarding a news report in which Michael Thomas claims he saved Jeffrey Epstein from a suicide attempt by hanging while they were cellmates.

locations: Metropolitan Correctional Center, New York, NY 10007
keyFacts: Michael Thomas, identified as Jeffrey Epstein's ex-cop cellmate, claims to have saved Epstein from a hanging suicide attempt.
The claim is reported in an email dated July 27, 2019, originating from a Bureau of Prisons supervisor at the Metropolitan Correctional Center in New York.
The document is marked as 'CONFIDENTIAL' and is part of the SDNY (Southern District of New York) case files.
